org.latency4j.configuration

Class Latency4JConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.latency4j.configuration.Latency4JConfiguration

  • public class Latency4JConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

    Bean-implementation which represents a Latency4J runtime configuration. It consists of one or more latency requirement templates, and one or more alert handler templates.

    Put differently, a configuration consists of one AlertHandlerGroupConfig and a LatencyRequirementGroupConfig, where the AlertHandlerGroupConfig instance contains configuration for the receptors of the alerts generated in relation to the requirements configured via the LatencyRequirementGroupConfig instance.
